attributes.action: listen to what your country wants when it comes to crime!!
attributes.additional_details: It's time to take a stand and make a change for history!! We want more police back on our streets. We want greater powers for our police force and most importantly we want tougher sentences to be imposed! The crimals in this country need to be better detered from crime! ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!! The British people want safety, security and we WANT to be listened to!! We vote to get your party to power now do what we voted for you to do!! Make this country Great again!!
attributes.background: With recent crime rises around the country From knife crime to vehicle crime the people of the United kingdom have had enough!! it's Time to stand up and make our government listen to what we want! Those who live on the streets that our mps and pm run!!
